(* RR's for all cause mortality, CVA and CHD incidence,   
within event type specified by gender, within gender by SBP-class
	(<120,120-140,140-160,160-180mmHg&no medication, >=180mmHg|medication),  
      within SBP-class by 5-years ageclasses (rest ageclass 85+)
      Notes: RR's for last class were calculated as RR's for >=160mmHg & no medication

Source: RR SBP report 2005 *)
